descriptionMdByRank.1:
Gain 1 stack of Hiss when dealing damage to the target, with 1 stack generated every 1s.
Hiss: each stack increases the wielder's ATK by **2%** for 3s, stacking up to 10 times.
Switching off the wielder clears all stacks. Gaining 10 stacks increases the wielder's Crit. Rate by **6%**.
